title: What are some international events that have taken place in the last five years that can be traced back to foreign policy? - Quora
tags: Foreign Policy of the United States of America

response.answer_text: I would argue that most international events of note can be traced back to foreign policy. The difficult task is finding one that cannot. A brief list: - civil war in Ukraine can be traced back to numerous foreign policies, including the EU's foreign policy toward Ukraine and the Soviet Union's foreign policy. - civil war in Syria can be traced back to foreign policies including Iranian foreign policy toward Assad, British/French foreign policy during colonization, and American foreign policy today. - ebola: while the disease itself may not reflect a foreign policy, the international response to it was a function of the international organizations embedded via American post WWII foreign policies.
